Detailed Description

Provides convenient functions for constructing commonly- and frequently-used waypoints.

After a Waypoint is fully constructed it still needs to be reported using Facade::waypointReached().

See Also
Facade::createWaypoint()

Member Function Documentation

static Waypoint* Chronicle::Facade::Waypoints::cameraChanged ( const String &  cameraName = String())
static

Constructs a Metadata::ViewCategory waypoint for when a camera changes.

Note
After constructing the waypoint, call (in any order) to completely define the camera parameters: cameraViewport() to define the viewport; one (and only one) of cameraFrustum(), cameraOrtho() or cameraPerspective() to define the projection; and cameraLookAt() to define the view. After the camera parameters have been defined, call Facade::waypointReached().
Parameters
cameraNameThe camera name (optional).
Returns
The constructed Waypoint instance.
static Waypoint* Chronicle::Facade::Waypoints::cameraFrustum ( Waypoint *  waypoint,
double  left,
double  right,
double  bottom,
double  top,
double  nearVal,
double  farVal 
)
static

Adds camera parameter attributes to a Metadata::ViewCategory waypoint.

Parameters
waypointThe Waypoint returned by cameraChanged().
left,rightThe coordinates for the left and right vertical clipping planes.
bottom,topThe coordinates for the bottom and top horizontal clipping planes.
nearVal,farValThe distances to the near and far depth clipping planes.
Returns
The same waypoint.
See Also
cameraLookAt(), cameraOrtho(), cameraPerspective(), cameraViewport(), Facade::waypointReached()

const Vector3D &  eye,
const Vector3D &  center,
const Vector3D &  up 
)
static

Adds camera parameter attributes to a Metadata::ViewCategory waypoint.

Parameters
waypointThe Waypoint returned by cameraChanged().
eyeThe position of the eye point.
centerThe position of the reference point.
upThe direction of the up vector.
Returns
The same waypoint.

Parameters
waypointThe Waypoint returned by cameraChanged().
left,rightThe coordinates for the left and right vertical clipping planes.
bottom,topThe coordinates for the bottom and top horizontal clipping planes.
nearVal,farValThe distances to the nearer and farther depth clipping planes.
Returns

static Waypoint* Chronicle::Facade::Waypoints::cameraPerspective ( Waypoint *  waypoint,
double  fovy,
double  aspect,
double  zNear,
double  zFar 
)
static

Adds camera parameter attributes to a Metadata::ViewCategory waypoint.

Parameters
waypointThe Waypoint returned by cameraChanged().
fovyThe field of view angle, in degrees, in the y direction.
aspectThe aspect ratio that determines the field of view in the x direction.
zNearThe distance from the viewer to the near clipping plane.
zFarThe distance from the viewer to the far clipping plane.
Returns
The same waypoint.
See Also
cameraFrustum(), cameraLookAt(), cameraOrtho(), cameraViewport(), Facade::waypointReached()

Completes a Metadata::DialogsCategory waypoint for a modal dialog session by setting its duration.

modalDialogItemChanged(), Facade::elapsedTimeSince(), Facade::waypointReached()
static Waypoint* Chronicle::Facade::Waypoints::modalDialogItemChanged ( Waypoint *  waypoint,
const String &  name,
const Variant &  value,
const Variant &  previousValue = Variant(),
const Rectangle &  itemRect = Rectangle() 
)
static

Adds an attribute to a Metadata::DialogsCategory waypoint to indicate that a dialog item changed value.

This method should be called for each changed dialog item just before invoking modalDialogClosed().

Parameters
waypointThe Waypoint returned by modalDialogOpened().
nameThe dialog item name (for example, "Show Status Bar").
valueThe new value of the dialog item.
previousValueThe old value of the dialog item.
itemRectThe rectangle of the dialog item, in dialog coordinates.
Returns
The same waypoint.
static Waypoint* Chronicle::Facade::Waypoints::modalDialogOpened ( const String &  title,
const Rectangle &  screenRect = Rectangle(),
const Variant &  image = Variant() 
)
static

Constructs a Metadata::DialogsCategory waypoint for a modal dialog session.

Parameters
titleThe dialog title (for example, "Preferences").
screenRectThe rectangle of the dialog box, in screen coordinates.
imageA screenshot of the dialog (image or image file path; default is none).
Returns
The constructed Waypoint instance.
See Also
modalDialogItemChanged(), modalDialogClosed()

Constructs a Metadata::SettingsCategory waypoint for when a plug-in setting changes.

const String &  language 
)
static

Adds language information to a Metadata::ProductsCategory waypoint.

Parameters
waypointThe Waypoint returned by registerProduct() or registerProductFromUPIConfigFile().

Returns
The same waypoint.
See Also
http://www.w3.org/International/articles/language-tags/
http://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt

const String &  version,
const String &  build,

)
static

Constructs a Metadata::ProductsCategory waypoint for identifying a plug-in.

Parameters

versionThe plug-in version.
buildThe plug-in build.
urlThe plug-in URL.
enabledtrue if the plug-in is enabled, otherwise false.
Returns
The constructed Waypoint instance.

static Waypoint* Chronicle::Facade::Waypoints::registerProduct ( const String &  name,
const String &  version,
const String &  build,
const String &  url = String() 
)
static

Constructs a Metadata::ProductsCategory waypoint for identifying the product.

Note
For products that have integrated UPI, use registerProductFromUPIConfigFile() instead.
Parameters
nameThe product name.
versionThe product version.
buildThe product build.
urlThe product URL.
Returns
The constructed Waypoint instance.
Note
After this function returns, report the product language with productLanguage().
See Also
Facade::waypointReached()
static Waypoint* Chronicle::Facade::Waypoints::registerProductFromUPIConfigFile ( const String &  path)
static

Constructs a Metadata::ProductsCategory waypoint for identifying the product.

Note
If your product hasn't integrated UPI, use registerProduct() instead.
Parameters
pathThe path to the product UPI configuration file.
Returns
The constructed Waypoint instance.
Note
After this function returns, report the product language with productLanguage().
See Also
Facade::waypointReached()

)
static

Note
The plug-in should be have been previously registered using registerPlugin().

Returns
The Attribute instance added to waypoint.

static Waypoint* Chronicle::Facade::Waypoints::toolStarted ( const String &  name,
const Variant &  toolID = Variant() 
)
static

Constructs a Metadata::ToolsCategory waypoint for when the use of a (non-instantaneous) tool begins.

Note
Don't use this function for instantaneous tools, use toolUsed() instead.
Parameters
nameThe tool name.
toolIDThe tool identifier.
Returns
The constructed Waypoint instance.
See Also
toolFinished(), toolFromPlugin()

const Variant &  toolID = Variant() 
)
static

Constructs a Metadata::ToolsCategory waypoint for when an instantaneous tool is used.

Note
Don't use this function for non-instantaneous tools, use toolStarted() instead.
Parameters
nameThe tool name.
toolIDThe tool identifier.
Returns
The constructed Waypoint instance.
See Also

static Waypoint* Chronicle::Facade::Waypoints::viewport2DChanged ( const Rectangle &  viewportRect,
const RectangleF &  viewportBounds,
const RectangleF &  documentBounds,
const String &  viewportName = String() 
)
static

Constructs a Metadata::ViewCategory waypoint for when a 2D viewport changes.

Parameters
viewportRectThe viewport rectangle, in screen coordinates.
viewportBoundsThe viewport bounds, in document coordinates.
documentBoundsThe document bounds; typically (0,0,width,height).
viewportNameThe viewport name (optional).
Returns
The constructed Waypoint instance.
See Also
Facade::waypointReached()
